assets.notes: Everyday UGC with natural lighting and realistic skin detail.

cta.text: BUY ONE, GET ONE FREE TODAY!

promptVars.product: a supplement bottle with a bright pink label that reads HAIR, SKIN AND NAILS GUMMY, white cap, brand name covered by a black rectangle
